meanings.definition: Of or relating to non-Jewish people or culture.
meanings.sent1: She wore a goyish dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served traditional goyish food.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see him attempt a goyish dance.
meanings.sent4: The goyish decorations transformed the room.
meanings.sent5: The goyish music filled the air with unfamiliar sounds.

meanings.definition: Behaving or appearing in a manner characteristic of non-Jewish people.
meanings.sent1: His goyish manners stood out in the synagogue.
meanings.sent2: She adopted a goyish accent when speaking English.
meanings.sent3: The goyish hat he wore made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her goyish gestures were a source of curiosity.
meanings.sent5: The goyish behavior at the event was unexpected.
